plot: Minorities often get oppressed throughout the world. But John shed a light on the matter of the systematic oppression that the Uighur people are facing at the hands of the Chinese government. Lack of pressure and public awareness aiding the Chinese government to get away with the heinous human rights abuses. John also urges United Nations, developed countries and as well as big corporations to pursue the Chinese government to abandon such inhumane practices Uighur people.—Niaz Islam Arif
